评论详情: The sequins in the bodice got caught on everything, including each other.  Very scratchy and irritating.
This dress is made just right, beautiful color, and fit The material is very good It looked very elegant I am 5’7” 165 pounds and got extra large It fit perfectly

This dress is stunning. It hugs your bodies curves, it’s stretchy, good value for the money, but the material is not the best. I ended up returning it because I didn’t want to look so extravagant for the event that I was going to, but definitely would recommend.

Needed a dress for my nephew's formal wedding. I ordered many dresses and returned them. I was just about to give up, until this dress arrived. It fit perfectly except that it was a few inches too long- it required a simple hem. The dress was very comfortable as well. It was not too low cut- I didn't have to worry about my bra straps showing or have to keep constantly adjusting anything. The slit in the leg was cut so that I could sit easily without showing too much skin. This dress hit the sweet spot of being appropriate for a church wedding, with glamour, class and a bit of sex appeal. Perfect dress for a formal wedding. Highly recommend!
This dress fits perfectly and looks glamorous on me. I’ll be wearing it on New Years Eve!
I wore this outfit to the high school military ball. I appreciate how well it fits and that it is not too revealing.

I’m 5’ 3”, 130 pounds and a size medium fit me perfectly.  I received so many compliments on this dress. You can’t beat it for the price. I did find it a bit difficult to steam the wrinkles out so giving it 4 stars.

I was skeptical of buying a dress online.  But nothing in stores was working for me. I wanted something slimming, a little dressy, and not break the bank. I was pleasantly surprised! This dress is fantastic! It's form fitting where you want it to be,  and covers what you want to hide. I received so many compliments and it was comfortable all night.

Loved the quality of the dress however thinking about the material, the inter part of my sleeves kept getting stuck to the dress. I wouldn’t have put sequence against sequence. Everyone loved the dress! I was the only one annoyed by this or could tell.
Perfect fit. True to size It is a beautiful dress.
Don’t wait, buy this excellent dress!!
Great dress. Fits well. Lots of compliments!
I love this dress, it was a perfect fit for the occasion.  It was not clinging and it was more classy and conservative.  I would recommend it for any wedding or anniversary .
Thank you for such a beautiful fit like a glove dress. I love it! I wore it to my brother's wedding! Your dress is now in a bunch of wedding pictures!
Dress fit very well, length was perfect, I received many compliments.
Lo tuve que devolver la tela es muy gruesa y no se ve elegante en lo personal no me gusto.
Me encantó mi vestido gracias Amazon
Bought this dress for a masquerade ball. It didn’t disappoint. I received so many compliments. It was comfortable, not scratchy at all, flattering and very classy.

评论概述: This was gorgeous and fit like a glove!
评论详情: I am 5'3" 137 pounds...and this dress fit like a glove. It is stunning on. It touched the floor but did not drag the floor without shoes on. It is shapely but hides all those things you want hidden. Quite flattering. I will post a picture when I can.
Very comfortable and true to size.  Lots of complement's.  Wore it for my nieces wedding.
Fits like a glove! Perfect length! Perfect everything. Over the moon with this purchase. So happy.
This dress was for a sneaker ball, it fit perfect true to size it actually makes you look very slim. I loved everything about it.
Absolutely gorgeous. Size and color match the product description and the slit looks so good. Excelleny fit n stitch.. Highly recommended!!

My measurements are 43-35-45, and I purchased a large. This dress fit like a glove!!  So beautiful and elegant, and gave off a vintage vibe!!  Perfect mother of the bride dress, or for special occasions!  Definitely worth having in your closet!
True to size. Stunning look. Got so many compliments

评论概述: Very pretty, great for balls, events, etc.
评论详情: Much like the photo and fits me nicely. Some small adjustments like hem because I’m on the short side. Sleeves could be a little tight if your arms are on the thicker side, but I picked a good size for myself and it fits ok. I think this makes a great ballroom dress or even wedding event dress. The material is actually a little stretchy, enough to get yourself in and if your hips are wide, it shouldn’t be too tight a fit. Looks nice, and I’m keeping it for when I’ve got a ball event.

This is a beautiful dress. The ruffle sort of looks like a peplum on. It is very flattering. This is designed to enhance curves. It is a very elegant dress with the sequins and is perfect for special occasions.

The hanger does NOT do it Justice! It hugs your body. I sized down for my daughter, based on measurements. Normally an xl, this L fit her perfectly! Not a ton of space for larger chests. The split is perfectly placed. You can really move and dance in this dress too!

评论概述: Very nice long dress ideal for an evening party.
评论详情: So, I ordered this MISSMAY women's elegant sequin V-neck evening dress on a whim because I needed a “cocktail attire” outfit for an evening beach wedding in June, in NC. Who orders a fancy dress online? I liked the various reviews and since I am the aunt, the review which stated that this was a modest gorgeous dress made me say…. why not? I also liked that there are sleeves with this to help camouflage some of my mature woman (not so pleasing) features. Well, I am very pleased. Also, I ordered the size large because one reviewer smaller than me ordered the medium and it fit her. I usually wear a size 10, and my measurement went with the large, and it fits like a glove. I am 5’4”, 35 inch bust and 145 lbs. The navy is perfect as it’s a beach color, and not too formal. I love how form-fitting this is, and yet so different because of the side leg slit and the sequined top. This dress is very comfortable, and the length with heels is perfect. I am very happy with this dress.  Positives: • Exactly like pictures • True to size/measurements • Elegant • Sexy side leg slit • Sleeves • Well made • Length is appropriate to the dress size  Negatives: • Only comes in 3 colors  5 stars

In my hunt for the perfect mother-of-the-groom dress, I bought three different dresses. This dress was the one I thought I’d like the least, because waist/hip ruffles don’t usually look good on me. Unexpectedly, this one is the winner! It looks sooo much better on than I expected, and flows as I walk! The sequins definitely make it stand out, but aren’t so sparkly that I’ll steal the bride’s thunder.  I’m 5’6” and the slit goes to *just* above my knee. You can wear a bra with this, so no tape is needed. It slims me where I need slimming, and even though parts of it are form fitting, it doesn’t accentuate my trouble areas at all.

评论概述: fills a need for a dinner
评论详情: This dress , is very form fitting, but makes a great one night event dress.  Price is good for a one time wear event. This is not something I would ear at a very formal wedding mother of the bride, but is great for a prom or a social event when one does not want to spend a ton of money on a formal.  I am 5.2 and 117# got a small and it  is skin tight, as it described and looks like in the pictures. Good for someone younger than me and ok on me, It hides my arms which is what I was after and will be worn at a fund raiser.

True to the size. I’m 5’2; 125 lbs and got M. The length worked okay with high heels. It was wrinkled when I received it so I ironed it with low heat even if it said no iron… I needed a modest formal dress so it was perfect. I got lots of compliments.

Overall this dress is super cute. It fit nicely everywhere but around where your hips and waist meet. It was a little baggy there around the zipper. The sequins are nice, the slit isnt uneven and the fabric is soft. The color is spot on to the picture. I ordered an XL and probably could have gotten a Large with how loose it is, there is little stretch so keep that in mind though and dont go too small.
